title: nf-scatac samplesheet schema
description: Schema for the samplesheet input to nf-scatac pipeline

sample.description: Sample identifier. Must be unique and contain no whitespace.
sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fragments.description: Path to 10x fragments.tsv.gz file. File must have extension '.tsv' or '.tsv.gz'.
fragments.errorMessage: Fragments file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tsv' or '.tsv.gz'

cellranger_dir.description: Path to CellRanger ATAC output directory (alternative to fragments).
cellranger_dir.errorMessage: CellRanger directory path cannot contain spaces

barcode_tag.description: BAM tag for cell barcodes (default: CB).
barcode_tag.errorMessage: Barcode tag must be exactly 2 uppercase letters

chemistry.errorMessage: Chemistry must be one of: 10x-atac-v1, 10x-atac-v2, custom
